body:
Welcome guys!


I have decided to start streaming Avicus a ton more than I usually do. I wanna try to start doing probably 2-3 Streams per week, and will feature different types of gamemodes depend on what I'm feeling like! :]

Twitch Link: http://twitch.tv/The_RileGuy



Types of Streams: 
There will be streams where I just do it myself by going solo, or sometimes I might just turn on some music for you guys to just sit listen and watch. I do also wanna do collaborations and teamspeak ll with you guys. You guys can also suggest streams in the comments so that would be greatly appreciated in case I run out of ideas.
  • Teamspeak Groups
  • Private Collabs
  • Plug.dj Streaming
  • Music Bot Streaming (To request songs you have to be a follower)
    •                 Notes: You request songs by doing the command !songrequest and the youtube ID which is the link to the video for everything after the v= 

                     (For Example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l4YKOzOlZGg will become v=I4YKOzOIZGg for the YouTube ID)



Current Stream:
Building Starburst two!

See you guys ingame!!
-Riley

See you guys ingame!!

I just wanna say thanks to everyone who subed to me today and I can't wait to hopefully get out there and enrich more peoples lives!! Bit anyways huge thanks to...

Regards,
Riley

replies.body:
Just so you guys all know I added a music bot to my Twitch and you can now request songs on there as well!

The command is:
!songrequest {Youtube ID Here}

Here is what a youtube id is:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xpgQa-TOk0M&index=1&list=PLaj0oW8rcn3ciB4kYSc-J-PT_S39PelX7

Its everything after the .com/ so basically: watch?v=xpgQa-TOk0M&index=1&list=PLaj0oW8rcn3ciB4kYSc-J-PT_S39PelX7

Hope you guys like it, Oh and I'm live!!!

replies.body_tagged: Stop spamming your post ffs

replies.body: Its a Streaming Hub m8 what do you expect xD sorry if I get really spammy I just want to get my channel to be a little bit more promoted so more people can learn about this server. I helped two people find out about Avicus yesterday and it really helped me know that this is my role as a livestreamer. To get people to know about Avicus. I was talking to Tynvale about it and that is why he does YouTube Videos, to promote Avicus. I'm sorry if I spam posts on here I just wanna let everyone know what I do and what I am trying to accomplish. :]
